title: Cloud Natural Language - Apache Airflow / Cloud Composer operators
abstract:
# Cloud Natural Language - Apache Airflow / Cloud Composer operators
You can include Cloud Natural Language tasks in a [Cloud Composer workflow](/composer/docs/how-to/using/writing-dags) using Apache Airflow [Cloud Natural Language operators](https://airflow.apache.org//docs/apache-airflow-providers-google/stable/operators/cloud/natural_language.html)
